data.title: The Last Unicorn
authors: Contributors to The Last Unicorn Wiki
data.meta_description: The Last Unicorn is a 1982 animated film. It was produced and directed by Jules Bass and Arthur Rankin Jr. for ITC Entertainment. The film is based on the novel by Peter S. Beagle. A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil king who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.
data.text:
The Last Unicorn is a 1982 animated film. It was produced and directed by Jules Bass and Arthur Rankin Jr. for ITC Entertainment. The film is based on the novel by Peter S. Beagle.

Synopsis[]

A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil king who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.
